note.p: Banker. Of Bearscombe, Devon. Married Sarah Ball Hingston, daughter of Joseph and Sarah Hingston of Dodbrook, at Kingsbridge in 1805. Partner with his father-in-law in the private bank of Hingston and Prideaux, Plymouth.
England & Wales, Quaker birth, marriage, and death registers, 1578–1837 (Ancestry.com, accessed 6 December 2019)
Modern English biography s.v. Prideaux, Walter (1806–89).
